name: Empty Dungeon Kills
description:
This game was developed for the Mini Jam 98: Empty and the limitation was Roguelike.

Empty Dungeon Kills is a roguelike dungeon exploring game with turn-based combat mechanics.

In Empty Dungeon Kills you find yourself in an empty dungeon. You wander around trying to explore it, but suddenly you notice the dungeon is not so empty after all...

Controls:
Movement - WASD / Arrow keys
Turn skip - Space
